resources.name: Create customer
List a customer
resources.description:

```response:406
{
  "error": {
    "name": "NOTACCEPTABLE",
    "message": "Error, expected a valid object-id",
    "status": 406
  }
}
```

```response:404
{
  "error": {
    "name": "NOTFOUND",
    "message": "This customer does not exist in our system",
    "status": 404
  }
}
```
